column1: ● The data before 1971 does not include Kinmen County and Lienchiang County.
● The data from 2025 onwards is projected.

● The data for the highest age represents the total for that age and above. Due to adjustments made to the statistical classification of the highest age in 1971, 1975, and 1992, the Change from previous year" and "Change in percent from previous year" for these connection points are not calculated.
